title: Panel For A Fan Case, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered in knot stitches
description: One side of a fan case, embroidered in polychrome silks and metal thread (principally knot stitches) in design showing a butterfly, a bird, and an animal with floral ornament. Lined.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel For A Fan Case, 18th century.Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered in knot stitches. 1939-37-4.
